title: One Piece Filler Arcs, Part 1 -- Dragons, Goats and Rainbow Mists
author: Blackjack
description: A detailed review and analysis of the Rainbow Mist/Ruluka Island Arc, discussing its strengths and weaknesses as a filler arc.

title: One Piece: Ruluka Island Arc (Filler) | Summary, Recap & Review
author: Poggers Staff
description: Comprehensive summary and review of the Ruluka Island Arc, describing it as a captivating but ultimately flawed storyline. Discusses the time-travel aspects and the touching story of the Pumpkin Pirates.

title: One Piece Diaries #19 – Ruluka Island
author: ComicCon Staff
description: A diary-style review of the Ruluka Island Arc, noting it as 'not a good time' but 'a little more interesting than the Goat Island arc.' Part of an ongoing One Piece episode review series.

title: 15 Worst One Piece Filler Arcs, Ranked
author: Screen Rant Staff
description: Rankings of One Piece filler arcs including the Ruluka Island Arc. Notes that 'despite the interesting time-travel aspects and the touching story of the Pumpkin Pirates, this arc simply feels much longer than it needed to be.'

title: Episode 140 - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Comprehensive wiki page for Episode 140 with detailed episode information, plot summary, character appearances, and trivia.

title: Ruluka Island Arc - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Complete wiki documentation of the Ruluka Island Arc, including all episodes, characters, locations, and plot details. Notes this was the last arc dubbed by 4Kids.

title: One Piece – Rainbow Mist Arc Recap
author: TV Tropes Contributors
description: TV Tropes recap page for the Rainbow Mist Arc with trope analysis and episode summaries. Discusses the time travel paradox and filler status.

title: One Piece Episode 140 on Crunchyroll
author: Toei Animation
description: Official streaming page for Episode 140 on Crunchyroll.

title: Episode 140 on IMDb
author: IMDb
description: IMDb page for 'Eien no Kuni no Juunin! Pumpkin Kaizokudan!' with ratings, credits, and user reviews. Episode rated 6.7/10.
